edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.reconfigurationutils

Class AggregateDemandProfiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.reconfigurationutils.AggregateDemandProfiler

  • public class AggregateDemandProfiler
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    V. Arun A utility class for maintaining demand profiles, specifically geo-distribution of demand in order to send it to reconfigurators.

      • trim

        public java.util.Set<AbstractDemandProfile> trim()
        If aggregate size becomes more than DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE, this method will pluck DEFAULT_PLUCK_SIZE out so that an active replica can report it to reconfigurators. This design allows an active replica to simply use transmission to reconfigurators as an alternative to persistently storing this information locally.
        Returns:
        Set of demand profiles to be shipped to reconfigurator(s).

      • pluckDemandProfile

        Returns:

        Returns:
